channel.title: Graphics - moparisthebest.com
channel.description: Topics in the 'Graphics' category Drawn a picture? Edited a photo with photoshop? Created an new Illustration? Post it here!

item.title: About the Graphics category
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

(Replace this first paragraph with a brief description of your new category. This guidance will appear in the category selection area, so try to keep it below 200 characters. Until you edit this description or create topics, this category won't appear on the categories page.)

Use the following paragraphs for a longer description, or to establish category guidelines or rules:

  • Why should people use this category? What is it for?

  • How exactly is this different than the other categories we already have?

  • What should topics in this category generally contain?

  • Do we need this category? Can we merge with another category, or subcategory?

Posts: 1

Participants: 1

Read full topic

item.title: [Request] Mr. Savage's Signature / Profile Pic
item.dc:creator: @vancepm vancepm
item.description:
@vancepm wrote:

Signature

Size: 700x300

Name: “Mr. Savage” / and my clan is “The Savage Empire”

Theme: Something that convey’s being a Savage (Money and Murda) perhaps someones head getting chopped off and loads of cash in the background (not sure if real money or gp would look better).

Color: Well im not exactly sure… Maybe like neon purple letters or neon cyan? and I want the back ground to be loads of cash or gp but if theres a color that needs to pick for the background then black!

Texture: Glassy or Glossy? I dont really know what any of the textures look like would be nice if the designer just chose what looked best for this.

Text: Neon letters umm cursive letters maybe?

Profile Pic

Size: 200x200

Im not quite sure what to do for this something thuggish? along the lines of a thief? something to do with a gangster? i dont know if you could do your best to make anything, that would be awesome of you and I would appreciate greatly. You can add text to it or just have a straight up pic or whatever I honestly dont have a good idea on a pic Just want it to have something to do with being a Savage… Maybe a Tiger that looks like its ripping through the screen??? 0.0 that’d be epic!

Sorry for all the unsure comments im not really good at creative thinking so if you could do your best to make what you think looks good than ill be happy appreciate anyone even reading this i did my best to follow the guidelines posted by xxlegitxx

item.title: Looking For 2D 16-Bit Game Artist
item.dc:creator: @Ian1045 Ian1045
item.description:
@Ian1045 wrote:

I’m looking for a 2D 16-bit artist who is interested in joining my project, you do not have to be a professional, but I do want it to look good, otherwise I would just do it myself- but I can’t that is why I am requesting the help of someone with superior skills than I.

I have the groundwork laid out for an awesome 2D game idea I have- there are a few different things I could do with this engine, I haven’t decided yet, and input is welcome. I just need some pretty graphics to complement everything!

This is what my ugly graphics look like right now:

MoEh8xa.png765×502

chdG5J7.png765×502

As you can see my graphics are in need of help, and I didn’t make that character. I need someone who can make tiles, grass, water, stone path? etc… along with character, or any items I will need. The 2006 RS GameFrame is not final by any means either. Like I said, you don’t have to be crazy good, just better than me, and have a good flow where all of your images look the same style, and it feels like a nice game.

Here is an example of what I’m talking about:

yDdBCnT.png735×412

Now obviously I’m not asking someone to produce content up to par with this- if you can that’s cool- I just wanted you to get the idea. Please no hate that I’m not willing to pay an artist 100’s of dollars, I’m just looking for someone who has a passion for graphics, and wants to be a part of a fun project. I want someone who even has a creative mind and can help me with further ideas for the game, but anyway, I’d love to see some samples, let me know if you’re interested!

Posts: 1

Participants: 1

Read full topic

item.title: Need Artist to create Charcter Jumping Animation through Images
item.dc:creator: @wetodded wetodded
item.description:
@wetodded wrote:

I’m working on an Android App. The Style of the game is cartoony. I would like to have a character that has an Idle animation, and a jumping animation. Here is a demo of the game on the Android App Store.

play.google.com

Red Light Green Light

NeverJudge

In this "Annoying" game, you will have to test your quick reaction skills. Can you get a highscore? Can you beat your friends? Play and find out! Get Achievements, and make your way to the top of the leaderboards!In diesem "Annoying" Spiel, müssen Sie Ihre schnelle Reaktion Fähigkeiten zu testen. Können Sie einen Highscore zu bekommen? Können Sie schlagen Ihre Freunde? Spielen Sie und finden Sie heraus! Holen Erfolge, und machen Sie Ihren Weg an die Spitze der Ranglisten...

Free

Also, if anyone wants to make a stoplight(cartoony), that has green and red lights active that would be nice aswell.

Credits will be placed into Game, with website ETC…
